name: Dawg's Waltz
description: Dawg’s Waltz combines the purple hues and flavors of Purple Urkle with the skunky aroma and powerful effects of Tres Dawg to create an extremely pungent hybrid. The dense buds have large calyxes and smell of spiced grape and skunky diesel. This hybrid is a favorite among those who struggle with chronic pain and insomnia, or enjoy the relaxing, couch-locked effects typical of most indica-dominant blends.
descriptionPlain: Dawg’s Waltz combines the purple hues and flavors of Purple Urkle with the skunky aroma and powerful effects of Tres Dawg to create an extremely pungent hybrid. The dense buds have large calyxes and smell of spiced grape and skunky diesel. This hybrid is a favorite among those who struggle with chronic pain and insomnia, or enjoy the relaxing, couch-locked effects typical of most indica-dominant blends.
aka: Dogs Waltz, Dog's Waltz, Dawgs Waltz, Doggs Waltz

highlightedReviews.text: I first tried this strain at Good Meds on Federal and it was surprisingly one that I would go back for. I recently got my red card and have been trying a few different dispensaries to see which one I like best and which ones have the best product. I was pleasantly surprised that the Dawg Waltz was a good strain that didn't make me feel too sleepy and made me very talkative. It was a pretty calming strain for me and helped my back pain as well.
My buddy brought back hella weed from colorado, and we mixed dawg's waltz, hercules, girl scout cookies, and blueberry. I feel this warm pressure around my head and it feels amazing. 9/10

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Sour Amnesia, Dawg's Waltz, Petrolia Headstash, Tangilope, and Rug Burn OG
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
It's Friday at last, so why not try some new strains this weekend? If you're feeling adventurous and looking for some new effects and flavors, we've got a few new varieties in the Leafly Explorer for you to try out. To our sativa-lovers, indica-lovers, and all of you in between, we're sure one of these newcomers will have what you're looking for.
Remember to nominate other new strains using the Leafly app, and don't forget to leave reviews for any of these newcomers if you've had the pleasure of trying them!
   1. Sour Amnesia
Characteristics of Sour Amnesia:

Mostly sativa strain
Cross between Sour Diesel and Amnesia
Breeder: HortiLab Seeds
Earthy, floral aroma with citrus and diesel undertones
Soaring, uplifting effects

   2. Dawg's Waltz
Characteristics of Dawg's Waltz:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Purple Urkle and Tres Dawg
Skunky grape aroma
Relaxing, couch-lock effects
May help with chronic pain and insomnia

   3. Petrolia Headstash
Characteristics of Petrolia Headstash:

Mostly indica strain
Descends from Afghani
Breeder: Reeferman Seeds
Pine, wood, and earthy aroma
Drowsy, relaxed effects
May help with cramps, pain, and stress

   4. Tangilope
Characteristics of Tangilope:

80/20 sativa-dominant strain
Cross between Tangie and Chocolope
Breeder: DNA Genetics
Chocolate, citrus aroma
Cerebral effects that evoke happiness, giggles, and creativity

   5. Rug Burn OG
Characteristics of Rug Burn OG:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Ghost OG and Rare Dankness #1
Sour citrus and diesel aroma
Strong, uplifting effects
